policy.xml:
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK DCR - Compose Request"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:Encapsulated>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="72449a64-b6a3-4c06-aeec-686cd2d071a5"/>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Software Statement Configuration"/>
            <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                <L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                    <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                </L7p:entry>
            </L7p:Parameters>
        </L7p:Encapsulated>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtkY3JfcGF5bG9hZH0="/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="dcr_request"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtzc2FfcGF5bG9hZH0="/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="ssa_request"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="${redirect_uris_json_path}"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="ssa_request"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="ssa_redirect_uris"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${ssa_redirect_uris.found}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.redirect_uris"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="dcr_request"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="dcr_redirect_uris"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dcr_redirect_uris.found}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ForEachLoop L7p:Usage="Required" iterationLimit="100" loopVariable="dcr_redirect_uris.results" variablePrefix="dcr_redirect_uri">
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ZmFsc2U="/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="redirect_uri_found"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ZmFsc2U="/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="ssa_redirect_uri.break"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:ForEachLoop L7p:Usage="Required" loopVariable="ssa_redirect_uris.results" variablePrefix="ssa_redirect_uri">
                        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dcr_redirect_uri.current}"/>
                                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${ssa_redirect_uri.current}"/>
                                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${ssa_redirect_uri.current}"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    </L7p:Predicates>
                                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                <L7p:SetVariable>
                                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="dHJ1ZQ=="/>
                                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="redirect_uri_found"/>
                                </L7p:SetVariable>
                                <L7p:SetVariable>
                                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="dHJ1ZQ=="/>
                                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="ssa_redirect_uri.break"/>
                                </L7p:SetVariable>
                            </wsp:All>
                            <L7p:TrueAssertion/>
                        </wsp:OneOrMore>
                    </L7p:ForEachLoop>
                    <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${redirect_uri_found}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                            <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                                <L7p:Detail stringValue="DCR redirect_uris '${dcr_redirect_uris.result}' is not sub-set or equal to SSA redirect uris '${ssa_redirect_uris.result}'"/>
                                <L7p:Level stringValue="WARNING"/>
                            </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                            <L7p:Encapsulated>
                                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="317"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                    </L7p:Properties>
                                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="56bd8147-3ab4-4d09-9460-8b2de02b7a9e"/>
                                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Fail with error message"/>
                                <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="apiPrefix"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="givenErrorCode"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="317"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                </L7p:Parameters>
                            </L7p:Encapsulated>
                        </wsp:All>
                    </wsp:OneOrMore>
                </L7p:ForEachLoop>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Redirect uri"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[//MUST match or be a subset of the software_redirect_uris claim in the SSA
                If omitted,  the entire contents of the software_redirect_uris element in the SSA are considered to be requested.]]></L7p:value>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                        <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.scope"/>
                        <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="dcr_request"/>
                        <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                        <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="dcr_scopes"/>
                    </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dcr_scopes.found}"/>
                        <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dcr_scopes.result}"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item regex="included">
                                <L7p:Pattern stringValue=".*(?:^|\W)openid(?:$|\W).*"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="Success"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//Minimum scope should be openid"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:All>
                <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                        <L7p:Detail stringValue="Invalid scopes '${dcr_scopes.result}'. Must have openid"/>
                        <L7p:Level stringValue="WARNING"/>
                    </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Encapsulated>
                        <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="319"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:AssertionComment>
                        <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="56bd8147-3ab4-4d09-9460-8b2de02b7a9e"/>
                        <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Fail with error message"/>
                        <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="apiPrefix"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="givenErrorCode"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="319"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Parameters>
                    </L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="Error"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:All>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Scope"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:OneOrMore>
            <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                            <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.application_type"/>
                            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="dcr_request"/>
                            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="dcr_application_type"/>
                        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                        <L7p:TrueAssertion/>
                    </wsp:OneOrMore>
                    <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dcr_application_type.found}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dcr_application_type.found}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dcr_application_type.result}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="web"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="web"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    </wsp:OneOrMore>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="Success"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//MUST be web if specified."/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:All>
                <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                        <L7p:Detail stringValue="Invalid application type ${dcr_application_type.result}"/>
                        <L7p:Level stringValue="WARNING"/>
                    </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Encapsulated>
                        <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="318"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:AssertionComment>
                        <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="56bd8147-3ab4-4d09-9460-8b2de02b7a9e"/>
                        <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Fail with error message"/>
                        <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="apiPrefix"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="givenErrorCode"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="318"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Parameters>
                    </L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="Error"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:All>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Application type"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:OneOrMore>
            <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                            <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.software_id"/>
                            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="dcr_request"/>
                            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="dcr_software_id"/>
                        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                        <L7p:TrueAssertion/>
                    </wsp:OneOrMore>
                    <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dcr_software_id.found}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dcr_software_id.found}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${software_id_json_path}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                            <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                                <L7p:Expression stringValue="${software_id_json_path}"/>
                                <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="ssa_request"/>
                                <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                                <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="ssa_software_id"/>
                            </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${ssa_software_id.found}"/>
                                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                </L7p:Predicates>
                            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dcr_software_id.result}"/>
                                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${ssa_software_id.result}"/>
                                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${ssa_software_id.result}"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                </L7p:Predicates>
                            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        </wsp:All>
                    </wsp:OneOrMore>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="Success"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//If specified, the software_id in the request MUST match the software_id specified in the SSA."/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:All>
                <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                        <L7p:Detail stringValue="DCR software_id ${dcr_software_id.result} did not match SSA software_id ${ssa_software_id.result}"/>
                        <L7p:Level stringValue="WARNING"/>
                    </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Encapsulated>
                        <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="316"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:AssertionComment>
                        <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="56bd8147-3ab4-4d09-9460-8b2de02b7a9e"/>
                        <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Fail with error message"/>
                        <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="apiPrefix"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="givenErrorCode"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="316"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Parameters>
                    </L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="Error"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:All>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Software id"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:OneOrMore>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Validate claims"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:All>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:JsonTransformation>
                <L7p:DestinationMessageTarget MessageTarget="included">
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="dcr_xml"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:TargetModifiedByGateway booleanValue="true"/>
                </L7p:DestinationMessageTarget>
                <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="dcr_request"/>
                <L7p:PrettyPrint booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:RootTagString stringValue="dcr"/>
                <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                <L7p:Transformation transformation="JSON_to_XML"/>
            </L7p:JsonTransformation>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="Add logic to extract if locale-specific values have been provided in the request"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="dcrXpath"/>
                <L7p:XmlMsgSrc stringValue="dcr_xml"/>
                <L7p:XpathExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="/dcr"/>
                    <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="s"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Namespaces>
                    <L7p:XpathVersion xpathVersion="XPATH_1_0"/>
                </L7p:XpathExpression>
            </L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
            <L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="//client name"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="dd1e6196-ab79-47c9-b289-347461251ec9"/>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Add or Update XML element"/>
                <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="element_name"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="client_name"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="element_parent_path"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="/dcr"/>
